Cougaar 12.7

Package org.cougaar.core.plugin

This package contains the Cougaar ComponentPlugin "plugin" base class.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PluginBase Inteface that describes the minimum expected capabilities of all Plugins.
 

Class Summary
AnnotatedSubscriptionsPlugin This class provides support for plugins that wish to use annotations to create and manage blackboard IncrementalSubscriptions.
ComponentPlugin This component is a base class for standard blackboard-client "plugins".
DemoTimeControlPlugin This component provides Servlet access to the DemoControlService for setting the demo (aka "execution") time of the local node.
ParameterizedPlugin  
PluginAlarm A standard Alarm implementation.
PluginManager This component is a container for ComponentPlugin and ComponentServlet components.
ServiceUserPlugin This component is a convenience base class for plugins that need to acquire services that may not be immediately available when first started.
ServletPlugin This plugin is a base class for servlets that either modify or subscribe to the blackboard.
ServletPlugin.HttpJob  
TestABA This component creates a test AttributeBasedAddress Relay.
TimestampServicePlugin This component advertises the BlackboardTimestampService for use by other plugins.
TodoPlugin Adds a TodoSubscription to an AnnotatedSubscriptionsPlugin.
 

Package org.cougaar.core.plugin Description

This package contains the Cougaar ComponentPlugin "plugin" base class.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
